trans-unit.source: No upload-folder is found. You should create a TEMP-folder ("_temp_") in the root of one of your mounts first!

trans-unit.target: Your login has probably expired. Do you want to refresh it now?

trans-unit.source: The TYPO3 backend is currently locked for maintenance. Leave this browser window open and the backend will automatically become available again once maintenance is complete.
trans-unit.target: The TYPO3 backend is currently locked for maintenance. Leave this browser window open and the backend will automatically become available again once maintenance is complete.

trans-unit.source: Your TYPO3 login is about to expire. Please confirm that you want to stay logged in.
trans-unit.target: Your TYPO3 login is about to expire. Please confirm that you want to stay logged in.

trans-unit.source: Your TYPO3 login has expired. You need to login again if you want to continue. Otherwise you can close the current browser window.
trans-unit.target: Your TYPO3 login has expired. You need to login again if you want to continue. Otherwise you can close the current browser window.

trans-unit.source: The Install Tool is still using the default password "joh316". Update this within the %sAbout section%s of the Install Tool.
trans-unit.target: The Install Tool is still using the default password "joh316". Update this within the %sAbout section%s of the Install Tool.

trans-unit.source: The default backend user "admin" with password "password" is still present. %sEdit this account%s, either deleting it completely or changing the username and password.
trans-unit.target: The default backend user "admin" with password "password" is still present. %sEdit this account%s, either deleting it completely or changing the username and password.

trans-unit.source: The value of fileDenyPattern is not set to its default:%s If TYPO3 is running on Apache, a customized value might enable backend or frontend users to execute malicious php scripts.
trans-unit.target: The value of fileDenyPattern is not set to its default:%s If TYPO3 is running on Apache, a customized value might enable backend or frontend users to execute malicious php scripts.

trans-unit.source: Security Risk! The new value of fileDenyPattern misses parts of its default:%s If TYPO3 is running on Apache, a customized value might enable backend or frontend users to execute malicious php scripts.
trans-unit.target: Security Risk! The new value of fileDenyPattern misses parts of its default:%s If TYPO3 is running on Apache, a customized value might enable backend or frontend users to execute malicious php scripts.

trans-unit.source: The current value of fileDenyPattern allows to upload/create files with the name ".htaccess". If TYPO3 is running on Apache, this enables backend or frontend users to create and execute php scripts. Please reset the value of fileDenyPattern to its default.
trans-unit.target: The current value of fileDenyPattern allows to upload/create files with the name ".htaccess". If TYPO3 is running on Apache, this enables backend or frontend users to create and execute php scripts. Please reset the value of fileDenyPattern to its default.

trans-unit.source: The Install Tool is permanently enabled. Delete the file "%s" when you have finished setting up TYPO3.
trans-unit.target: The Install Tool is permanently enabled. Delete the file "%s" when you have finished setting up TYPO3.

trans-unit.source: Click to remove the file now!
trans-unit.target: Click to remove the file now!

trans-unit.source: The encryption key is not set. Set it in the %sBasic Configuration section%s of the Install Tool.
trans-unit.target: The encryption key is not set. Set it in the %sBasic Configuration section%s of the Install Tool.

trans-unit.source: This installation is not configured for the TYPO3 version it is running. If you did so intentionally, this message can be safely ignored. If you are unsure, visit the %sUpdate Wizard%s section of the Install Tool to see how TYPO3 would change.
trans-unit.target: This installation is not configured for the TYPO3 version it is running. If you did so intentionally, this message can be safely ignored. If you are unsure, visit the %sUpdate Wizard%s section of the Install Tool to see how TYPO3 would change.

trans-unit.source: The Reference Index table is empty which is likely the result of a recent TYPO3 upgrade. Please go to %sTools>DB Check%s and update the reference index.
trans-unit.target: The Reference Index table is empty which is likely the result of a recent TYPO3 upgrade. Please go to %sTools>DB Check%s and update the reference index.

trans-unit.source: The Reference Index table is empty which is likely the result of a recent TYPO3 upgrade. The Reference Index was last updated on %3$s. Please go to %sTools>DB Check%s and update the reference index.
trans-unit.target: The Reference Index table is empty which is likely the result of a recent TYPO3 upgrade. The Reference Index was last updated on %3$s. Please go to %sTools>DB Check%s and update the reference index.

trans-unit.target: Validating the security token of this form has failed. Please reload the form and submit it again.

trans-unit.source:
You have now used TYPO3 for more than three months. It would be great if you could donate. TYPO3 is Open Source and relies heavily on donations from its users and supporters.
Thank you for making this great Content Management System even better with your help!
trans-unit.target:
You have now used TYPO3 for more than three months. It would be great if you could donate. TYPO3 is Open Source and relies heavily on donations from its users and supporters.
Thank you for making this great Content Management System even better with your help!

trans-unit.source:
Ext Direct error in "%s" with namespace: "%s"
 Try to clear the TYPO3 cache and / or use paramater no_cache=1 as parameter in URL typo3/ajax.php

 Check also the following points:
 - configuration in ext_localconf.php: registration key should be like "TYPO3.MyExtension.Sample"
 - URL typo3/ajax.php: namespace parameter should be like: "TYPO3.MyExtension"
 - javascript: method's name should be like: "TYPO3.MyExtension.Sample.myMethod"
trans-unit.target:
Ext Direct error in "%s" with namespace: "%s"
 Try to clear the TYPO3 cache and / or use paramater no_cache=1 as parameter in URL typo3/ajax.php

 Check also the following points:
 - configuration in ext_localconf.php: registration key should be like "TYPO3.MyExtension.Sample"
 - URL typo3/ajax.php: namespace parameter should be like: "TYPO3.MyExtension"
 - javascript: method's name should be like: "TYPO3.MyExtension.Sample.myMethod"

trans-unit.source: Ext Direct error in "%s": no namespace has been found.
trans-unit.target: Ext Direct error in "%s": no namespace has been found.

trans-unit.source: Please, do not link to this page. Use t3lib_BEfunc::getListViewLink() for link generation.
trans-unit.target: Please, do not link to this page. Use t3lib_BEfunc::getListViewLink() for link generation.

trans-unit.source: Please, do not link to this page.
trans-unit.target: Please, do not link to this page.

trans-unit.source: An SQL error occured. This may indicate a schema mismatch between TCA and the database. Try running database compare in the Install Tool.
trans-unit.target: An SQL error occured. This may indicate a schema mismatch between TCA and the database. Try running database compare in the Install Tool.
